fact: Honey never spoils. Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still perfectly edible.
explanation: Honey has very low moisture and is acidic, creating an environment where bacteria and spoilage organisms cannot survive.

fact: Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood.
explanation: Two hearts pump blood to the gills, while a third circulates it to the rest of the body. Their blood is blue because it uses copper to transport oxygen, rather than iron.

fact: A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
explanation: Venus rotates very slowly on its axis, taking 243 Earth days to complete one rotation. However, it orbits the Sun relatively quickly, completing a revolution in just 225 Earth days.

fact: The shortest war in history lasted between 38 and 45 minutes.
explanation: The Anglo-Zanzibar War occurred on August 27, 1896. The conflict began at 9:00 AM and ended shortly after when the Sultan's forces surrendered.

fact: The first webcam was invented to check the status of a coffee pot.
explanation: In 1991, researchers at the University of Cambridge set up a camera pointing at the Trojan Room coffee pot so they could check if there was coffee before walking down the hall.
